prodNameC: 宙斯ANA/HEp-2 細胞培養間接螢光抗體檢測系統
prodNameE: ZEUS IFA ANA HEp-2 TEST SYSTEM
ingredientsDesc:
1.	Goat anti-human immunoglobulin (polyvalent) labeled with FITC. 2.5 mL (Product #:2403B.)
2.	Human ANA-positive control serum, 0.7 mL. (Product #: 2404)*.
3.	Human ANA-negative control serum, 0.7 mL. (Product #: 2405)*.
4.	ANA HEp-2 cell culture substrate slides (Product #: 25021, containing 10 wells plus 2 control wells)
5.	ZORBA-NS® sample diluent formulated to reduce nonspecific staining. (Product #: Z025, 25mL)
6.	PBS (Product #: 0008)
7.	Mounting Media (Product #: 0009), 3mL.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 用來作為定性及半定量的抗核抗體之偵測。
